# radius

**Instance Property**

The radius of the blur, in pixels.

## Declaration

```swift
var radius: Float { get set }
```

## Instance Properties

- **angle**: The angle of the motion, in radians, that determines which direction the blur smears.
- **inputImage**: The image to use as an input image.
